boardgame.name: Boonanza: Het Dobbelspel
Würfel Bohnanza
boardgame.description: W_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;rfel Bohnanza is, as you might suspect, a dice game in the Bohnanza family. Instead of cards, dice give you the beans that you must use to satisfy orders and (eventually) collect _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Bohnentalers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (i.e., dollars, bucks, dinero...). The first player to collect thirteen Bohnentalers wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the start of the game, each player receives two order cards, each of which shows six orders; the player tries to complete orders on one card while using the other to cover completed orders. The easiest orders to complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; say, two specific bean types or three beans in any combination of two types _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; are at the bottom of the card, and the hardest ones _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; requiring, say, a four-of-a-kind or seven beans with no blue ones _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; are at the top. Orders must be completed from bottom to top._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On a turn, the active player starts by rolling the seven bean dice, three of which have one combination of beans and four of which have another combination. This player must set aside at least one bean, then she rerolls any remaining dice, setting at least one aside, etc. After at most seven rolls, she completes as many orders as she can, reusing the dice as needed to complete orders. Once a player completes three orders, she can _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;harvest_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; the card for one coin. Each additional completed order is worth a coin, up to a maximum of four. When a player harvests the order card, she draws a new card and uses that to record completed orders (possibly on the same turn) on the order card she already had._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the Bohnanza card game, players trade cards to improve the standing of both parties involved in the trade. In W_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;rfel Bohnanza, the active player doesn't trade dice, but opponents do get to benefit from that player's rolls. After each roll by the active player, all other players can use the dice just rolled _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and not dice already set aside _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; to complete orders on their own cards. Thus, the active player has some incentive not to dawdle too much with her rolls as her opponents might benefit from her turn more than she does._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends as soon as one or more players have collected thirteen Bohnentalers. The player with the most Bohnentalers wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2012 Spiel der Spiele Hit für Familien Recommended

I also accept ZERO-FEE _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Personal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; PAYPAL payments that use a bank account or your existing Paypal balance as the payment source (NOT a credit card, unless you pick the option to pay the fees yourselves) for the exact sale price plus exact postage. To make a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Personal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Paypal payment, you: Log in to your Paypal account, click _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Send Money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, then choose the option of send money to friends and family, NOT to purchase goods. In shrink. Item is in very good condition. I treat my games very well. If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I will work with you to ship the most cost efficient way or however you prefer. When I ship things I take extra measurers to mitigate any potential shipping damage. If the item is a small card game the shipping will be USPS First Class and will be around $3.50 total or if it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s over 1 pound in weight it will be sent USPS Priority Mail, which is $6.10 total with shipping materials. English rules are on BGG and are super easy to print off, cut out and fold into box.
